data.name: FRM_Title
data.value: SharePoint Learning Kit

data.name: FRM_AssignmentNotAvailableTitle
data.value: Assignment Not Available

data.name: FRM_AssignmentNotAvailableMsgHtml
data.value:
This assignment is not available.

This may be because:
  • The assignment does not exist.
  • You are accessing an assignment prior to its start date.
  • You do not have access to the requested view of the assignment.
More information may be available in the server event log.

data.name: FRM_AssignmentTurnedInMsgHtml
data.value:
This assignment is not available because it has been submitted as complete.

You can review this assignment after it is returned by your instructor.

data.name: FRM_AssignmentNotGradableTitle
data.value: Grading Not Available

data.name: FRM_AssignmentCantBeGradedMsgHtml
data.value:
You cannot grade this assignment until it has been submitted.

To enable grading, you can collect the assignment or have the learner submit the assignment.

data.name: FRM_ReviewNotAvailableTitle
data.value: Review Not Available

data.name: FRM_ReviewNotAvailableMsgHtml
data.value: You cannot review this assignment until it has been started by the learner.

data.name: FRM_LearnerReviewNotAvailableMsgHtml
data.value: You cannot review this assignment until it has been returned.

data.name: FRM_InvalidStatusForViewTitle
data.value: Assignment Not Available

data.name: FRM_DocumentNotFoundTitleHtml
data.value: File Not Found

data.name: FRM_DocumentNotFound
data.value: The requested document could not be found.
data.comment: The message that is displayed if the location string for a learner assignment does not parse into a document that can be found. Only used for non-elearning content.

data.name: FRM_PackageNotFoundTitle
data.value: Assignment Resource Not Available

data.name: FRM_PackageNotFound
data.value: The version of the learning resource assigned for this assignment cannot be found because it has been deleted or modified.

data.name: HID_SelectActivityTitleHtml
data.value: Select an Activity

data.name: HID_SelectActivityMessageHtml
data.value: Select an activity to continue with the assignment.

data.name: HID_SessionCompletedTitle
data.value: Assignment Complete

data.name: HID_SessionAbandonedTitle
data.value: Assignment Abandoned

data.name: HID_SessionSuspendedTitle
data.value: Assignment Suspended

data.name: HID_GradingFinishedTitle
data.value: Grading Finished

data.name: HID_GradingFinishedMessage
data.value: This grading session is finished. You can return to this assignment later to add or change grading information.

data.name: HID_ExecuteViewAbandonedSessionMsg
data.value: The assignment has been abandoned. You cannot make any further changes.

data.name: HID_ExecuteViewCompletedSessionMsg
data.value: This assignment has been submitted as complete. You cannot make any further changes.

data.name: HID_ExecuteViewSuspendedSessionMsg
data.value: This assignment has been suspended. You can return later to resume the assignment.

data.name: FRM_CannotDisplayContentTitle
data.value: Cannot Display Assignment

data.name: FRM_SessionIsNotActiveMsg
data.value: This assignment has been completed. You cannot make any further changes.

data.name: FRM_UnexpectedViewRequestHtml
data.value: The available session does not match the request view of the assignment.

data.name: CON_InvalidFileAttachmentTitleHtml
data.value: File Attachment Error

data.name: CON_MaxFileSizeExceededMsgHtml
data.value:
The attached files listed below are larger than the allowed limit of {0} KB. Reduce the size of these files and try again.

Invalid files:
data.comment: {0}=numeric size. Following this message is the list of file names that are not valid.

data.name: CON_InvalidFileExtensionMsgHtml
data.value:
The attached files listed below are not allowed file types.

Invalid files:
data.comment: Following this message is the list of file names that are not valid.

data.name: CON_FilesDontExistHtml
data.value:
The attached files listed below are empty or do not exist.

Invalid files:

data.name: CON_InvalidFileAttachmentMsgHtml
data.value: Administrators can change the file attachment settings in SharePoint Central Administration by modifying the SharePoint Learning Kit settings file.

data.name: FRM_SignInRequiredMsgHtml
data.value: You must sign in to access this assignment.

data.name: FRM_UnexpectedErrorNoException
data.value: The assignment cannot be displayed. Try refreshing your browser.

data.name: TOC_SubmitAssignment
data.value: Submit Assignment

data.name: TOC_SubmitGrading
data.value: Finish Grading
data.comment: Title of the grading ending page in TOC.

data.name: POST_SubmitHtml
data.value: Submit

data.name: HID_SubmitPageTitleHtml
data.value: Submit this Assignment?

data.name: HID_SubmitGradingPageTitleHtml
data.value: Finish Grading?
data.comment: Title of the question to the user asking if they are done with grading.

data.name: HID_SubmitPageMessageHtml
data.value:
You cannot make any further changes after you submit this assignment.

If you have completed the assignment, click Submit.

If you are not ready to submit the assignment, click Cancel to return to the previous page.

data.name: HID_SubmitPageMessageNoCurrentActivityHtml
data.value:
You cannot make any further changes after you submit this assignment.

If you have completed the assignment, click Submit.

If you are not ready to submit the assignment, select an activity to continue the assignment.

data.name: HID_SubmitGradingPageMessageHtml
data.value:
All grading changes have been saved.

Click Finish to end this grading session. You can return to this assignment later to add or change grading information.

If you are not ready to finish grading, click Cancel to return to the previous page.

data.name: FRM_SubmitPageBtnHtml
data.value: Submit

data.name: FRM_SubmitGradingPageBtnHtml
data.value: Finish

data.name: HID_MoveNextFailedHtml
data.value: You cannot navigate to the next page at this time. Click Continue to return to the assignment.

data.name: HID_MovePreviousFailedHtml
data.value: You cannot navigate to the previous page at this time. Click Continue to return to the assignment.

data.name: HID_MoveToActivityFailedHtml
data.value: You cannot navigate to the selected activity at this time. Click Continue to return to the assignment.

data.name: POST_ContinueHtml
data.value: Cancel

data.name: FRM_ResourceNotFound
data.value: Resource not found.
data.comment: Internal exception indicating a resource could not be found. This is likely a coding error.

data.name: FRM_UnexpectedExceptionMsg
data.value: An error occurred. More information may be available in the server event log.

data.name: FRM_GradingPageNotUpdated
data.value: Changes to this page will no longer be reflected in the grading page when you close this window. To fix this, save your changes and re-open the assignment from the grading page.

data.name: FRM_ObserverReviewNotAvailableMsgHtml
data.value:
You can't review this assignment at this moment. This may be because of one of the reasons given below:
  • Learner not started the assignment
  • Learner completed the assignment and submitted to the instructor for grading
  • You do not have access to the requested view of the assignment.

data.name: FRM_ObserverReviewNotAvailableTitle
data.value: Observer Access Error
data.comment: Title of the frameset in case the user is an observer and unable to access it
